entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of rain beginning early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
